entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AOT Native DLL with exported function name of "free" fails when using HttpClient #52436
  • [Blazor] Unnecessary Html comments in the script tag #52435
  • [Blazor] Supplying a `null` parameter value to an interactive root component causes a `NullReferenceException` on enhanced navigation #52434
  • Shadow copies fails to gracefully handle deleted folders between publishes #52433
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google doesn't work out of the box with swagger UI #52432
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52431
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, json #52430
  • Flaky test InjectedStartup_DefaultApplicationNameIsEntryAssembly #52429
  • False warning for attribute routes when using route tokens #52427
  • ASP.NET Core 8 Identity register Endpoints issue with SQLite Provider EF Core #52426
  • ProblemHttpResult doesn't show in generated OpenApi document #52424
  • CSS nesting does not work fully in isolated CSS files #52422
    Backlog
  • Static file and routing with asterisk template conflict #52420
  • OutputCache configuration - policy validation #52419
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52418
  • Error loading blazor webassembly application with modified base path and using a reverse proxy #52417
    Planning: WebUI
  • which authentication shceme is used to authenticate the current request #52415
  • Support Latest ProblemDetails RFC (July 2023, RFC 9457) #52414
  • FocusOnNavigate does not work (dotnet8 - BlazorWebApp) #52412
    Planning: WebUI

Closed

  • Blazor.platform.readStringField not working anymore after dotnet 7.0 upgrade #45274
  • Perf improvement: mvc #52386
  • Removal of index.html in .net 8 needs a migration tip for apache servers #52409
    Planning: WebUI
  • Including Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 8.0.0 breaks WebAPI debugging #52413
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button formenctype attribute #52019
    8.0.x
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor enctype form attribute #52018
    8.0.x
  • Blazor enhanced form using wrong default enctype #52024
    8.0.x
  • authentication blazor web app #52421
  • [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #51774
    8.0.x
  • Add Account/AccessDenied endpoint to blazor web template #52167
    8.0.1
  • BWA project template: "@" on @render-mode values and `.Client` project assembly discovery #52084
    8.0.1
  • Enabled option "Do not use top-level statements" ignored in "Blazor Web App" template for WebAssembly client #52079
    8.0.1
  • JSONTranscoding: Handling of explicit nulls in JSON #51742

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates #52428
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Fix enhanced form handling use defalt enctype, honor enctype and formenctype #52359
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Improve Blazor project template #52234
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Fix deserializing null properties to Protobuf types #52398
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Clean up helix retry list #52313
    needs-area-label
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Delete Stale Chunks #52272
    area-auth, 9.0-preview1
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, pending-ci-rerun, needs-breaking-change-announcement, area-networking
  • Update SauceLabs Connection version #45242
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [WIP] Support metadata only endpoints #46536
    area-routing
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Draft: Support null values in Results/TypedResults #49588
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix text field generator with explicit value. #49608
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • ServerSentEvents: Support CRLF + LF as line endings #49727
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add New Event for Customizing Chain Policy Before Certificate Validation #49789
    area-auth, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Try Adding Support for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Implement IDirectoryContents on ManifestDirectoryInfo #50586
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Avoid excessive WellKnownType cache misses in RDG #50669
    pending-ci-rerun, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK version #50734
    area-infrastructure
  • Retry stateful reconnect attempts #50745
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • [2.1] Fix IPNetwork.Contains for prefixes which are not at start of subnet range. #50967
    * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware, 2.1.x
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, Planning: WebUI
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • QuickGrid static pagination #51217
    area-blazor
  • SignOutHttpResult/SignOutResult ctor overloads that take a single authentication scheme #51220
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • ApiConventionAnalyzer: support switch expressions #51359
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Respect "grpc-status-details-bin" trailer on error response #51394
    area-grpc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Update SourceIndexPackageVersion #51715
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix duplicate add of items to Compile on Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client.targets #51846
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • SignalR transport has unexpected behaviour about transport when calling withUrl() twice #51875
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Un-quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.InteractivityTest.AutoRenderMode_UsesBlazorServerOnFirstLoad_ThenWebAssemblyOnSuccessiveLoads` #51887
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Fixed HostFilteringMiddleware. Added HostFilteringMiddleware.MiddlewareConfigurationManager #52038
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52103
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52104
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add HTTP Gone (410) result #52377
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, area-networking
  • gRPC JSON transcoding — Fixed parsing string values into enum when provided string is not valid enum value #52402
    area-grpc, community-contribution
